member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.WpfHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationProvider.CanProvide(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if current instance can provide configuration of type.
member.returns: true if current instance can provide desired configuration; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.WpfHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationProvider.Presenter
member.summary: Gets the read-write configuration presenter control.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.WpfHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationProvider.SummaryPresenter
member.summary: Gets the read-only configuration presenter control.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.WpfHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationProvider.Configuration
member.remarks: Returns null if configuration is not valid.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.WpfHost.Extensibility.IDataAdapterConfigurationProvider.CommandLineArguments
member.summary: Gets the collection of command line arguments, representing current configuration.

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases. TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing and internal use only
